With stunning cinematography and memorable performances from Kevin Costner and Wes Studi, this classic war drama is a must-watch!

I think I've got just the thing for you! Since you mentioned Aladdin and were expecting a different vibe, I'm going to suggest two movies that might surprise you in a good way.

Firstly, Moulin Rouge! is a visually stunning musical romp set in 1890s Paris. With an all-star cast, including Ewan McGregor and Nicole Kidman, it's a whirlwind of music, drama, and romance that will keep you enthralled. And who knows, you might just find yourself swept up in the dance numbers!

If you're looking for something a bit more modern and action-packed, The Equalizer is a great choice. With Denzel Washington leading the cast as a former Black Ops operative turned private detective, it's an intense thriller that explores themes of justice and morality. Plus, with Chloë Grace Moretz and Marton Csokas in supporting roles, there's plenty to keep you engaged!
